bioghist.p: George E. Pepin served in Co. B, 310th Engineers, during the American intervention in North Russia. Pepin enlisted at Camp Custer, Mich., on July 3, 1918. His unit departed from the United States for Russia on July 21, 1918. Pepin returned to the United States on August 3, 1919, and was discharged at Camp Sherman, Ohio, August 13, 1919.

scopecontent.p: Typescript of diary of Pepin's military service; also Russian postcards and photographs of Pepin.
